page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT IN SEAHAM
page.content: IN THE PAST THE COLLIERIES ACCOUNTED FOR THE BULK OF EMPLOYMENT IN SEAHAM BUT BECAUSE OF A SLIMMING DOWN IN THE INDUSTRY THEY NOW ONLY ACCOUNT FOR ABOUT 40% OF EMPLOYED PEOPLE.SCHOOL LEAVERS ARE FINDING IT PARTICULARLY DIFFICULT TO FIND JOBS AND BECAUSE OF THIS A COMMUNITY PROGRAMME AGENCY HAS BEEN SET UP FOR THESE YOUNGSTERS TO DO JOBS OF BENEFIT TO THE TOWNSPEOPLE. THEY HAVE LAID PATHS AND CLEARED WASTELAND.THE LOCAL COUNCIL HAS RECENTLY BUILT THREE NURSERY FACTORY UNITS IN AN ATTEMPT TO BRING SMALL OR LARGE INDUSTRY TO SEAHAM.THIS HAS HAD MIXED SUCCESS.MANY YOUNG FEMALES GAIN WORK IN THE SHOPS OR WITH THE BEAU BRUMMELL CLOTHING FACTORY.THEIR ARE NUMEROUS SMALL FIRMS AND BUSINESSES FOR EMPLOYMENT AND IN RECENT YEARS THE SEAHAM HARBOUR DOCK COMPANY HAS TAKEN A GREATER SHARE OF WORKERS.
